pkgmetadata.longdescription: Accurate Estimation of Influenza Epidemics using Google Search Data // Augmented Regression with General Online data (ARGO) for accurate estimation of influenza epidemics in United States on both national level and regional level. It replicates the method introduced in paper Yang, S., Santillana, M. and Kou, S.C. (2015) doi:10.1073/pnas.1515373112 and Ning, S., Yang, S. and Kou, S.C. (2019) doi:10.1038/s41598-019-41559-6.
